title: PLEASE let us mute LLs and champs, I'M BEGGING YOU, PLEASE!!!
body:
**I would literally pay $$$ for this option.**  I currently turn off my sound after every battle and the entirety of every carousel, because I don't want to hear Gnar screech "SHUGGY SHUGGY SHUUUUUUUUUUGGY!" or the Shisas scream their heads of non-stop.  **LET US MUTE THEM.
**
#PLEASE.

You added the mute option for chat and emotes, which is a step up, but **PLEASE I BEG YOU, LET ME PLEASE IN PEACE!**

#I'M OFFERING REAL MONEY FOR THIS OPTION!
